scripts.kafka-native-compose: docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-kafka-native/kafka-native-compose.yml up -d && node examples/docker-compose-kafka-native/test-kafka-native-compose.js && docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-kafka-native/kafka-native-compose.yml down
scripts.kafka-native-schema-registry-compose: docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-kafka-native-cp-scehma-registry/kafka-native-cp-schema-registry-compose.yml up -d && node examples/docker-compose-kafka-native-cp-scehma-registry/test-kafka-native-cp-schema-registry-compose.js && docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-kafka-native-cp-scehma-registry/kafka-native-cp-schema-registry-compose.yml down
scripts.cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry-compose: docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry/cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry-compose.yml up -d && node examples/docker-compose-cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry/test-cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry-compose.js && docker compose -f examples/docker-compose-cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry/cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry-compose.yml down
scripts.test: pnpm kafka-native-compose && pnpm kafka-native-schema-registry-compose && pnpm cp-kafka-cp-schema-registry-compose && pnpm test-containers-with-cp-kafka && pnpm test-containers-with-cp-kafka-cp-schema
